name: Razors Edge
description:
Currently the game only consists of one level with no other vehicles and no way of loosing :)

This game was created as an entry to VimJam 2 with the theme "On the edge" and the limitation "Boss" and has been created by a family-team consisting of mother, father and son.

Credits

Game and Level Design: Elis, Åsa and David Gillberg

Code: David Gillberg

Assets: 

Buildings from "Raffles City Tower" by namk07a3: https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/raffles-city-tower-max-free/988483

Vehicle is "Futuristic Motorcycle Low-poly subdivision-ready 3D model" by Erudite12: https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/futuristic-motor-3d-model-1635724

Track parts are from "Modular Racetrack - 3D Models" by Keith at Fertile Soil Productions: https://opengameart.org/content/modular-racetrack-3d-models

The Sky Box is from "AllSky Free - 10 Sky / Skybox Set" by rpgwhitelock:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/allsky-free-10-s...

www.richardwhitelock.com
